result.title: A report on the perceived educational gaps among craft-makers
result.description: The report will present the results of the online questionnaire, and the analysis of the co-creation workshops. Tor Vergata will write this report with regards to the different knowledge areas covered by the projects (digital/tech, entrepreneurial/organisational skills). Such needs will be the input for the design of the bottom-up educational curricula in T4.3 in a report on knowledge gaps and needs for continuous education in the craft sector.

result.title: Report on the future of cosmopolitanism in Europe
result.description: Report on the future of cosmopolitanism in Europe. This text will provide the outline of a possible future and desirable cosmopolitan ideal for the EU. It will start from the given circumstances and necessary requirements for any legitimate transnational and European order and argue for a European multilevel system, which would guarantee democracy, basic rights and respect for diversity within Europe, have fairly open borders for immigrants willing to come to the EU and be fully integrated in a globally legitimate and just structure. These findings will also be presented and discussed at the Final Conference.
